name: 迈克尔·兰德斯 Michael Landes
intro: Michael Landes was born on September 18, 1972 in Bronx, New York, USA. He is an actor and producer, known for Final Destination 2 (2003), 11-11-11 (2011) and Burlesque (2010). He has been married to Wendy Benson-Landes since October 21, 2000. They have two children.
